author: antazoey
content: Does anyone know how I can observe the `genesis.json` file that gets used when doing `geth --dev`?

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: Geth doesn't use a genesis file when running `--dev`, we will create a new, different, genesis on every execution

author: antazoey
content: What happens when you use a genesis file with `geth --dev`? Do things get wonky then?

author: antazoey
content: I was thinking that if I want to use a genesis file, I need to some how mimic the other attributes of that genesis that geth dev does otherwise... Also, I don't need to use get `geth --dev` but then I would need to do the same thing manually, deleting and recreating the blockchain every time
